column5: I am looking for this fuse for my trolling motor. Fuse reads shortstop 24VOC R20 40A Does anyone know where I can find this ? please help ASAP. Need to fish on Sunday thanks
any 24v 40 + amp stud type circuit  breaker should work princess auto should have them

I have no idea what marine stores you have up there, one of the ones in my area lists this product. BLUE SEA SYSTEMS 40A Marine Grade Short Stop Circuit Breaker | West Marine Does it have to be an exact match? One of your marine stores may carry them?
Any type of 24 volt dc 40 amp breaker or fuse will do the job.  I'd say get the breaker, re-settable just like in a house.  Michael
Stereo stores have them. Princes Auto, nappa  , CARQUEST. The battery side contact little harder to find.
Thanks guys. Found it at princess auto. worked out well and got some fishing done

Glad you got it sorted out. For future reference, I'd recommend going to one of these...very convenient.  https://www.cabelas.ca/product/19587?productVariantId=67259&gclid=EAIaIQobChMIvenOh-ar3gIVSYezCh0onALBEAYYASABEgL6WfD_BwE
Those work great if yo require a 60amp. Had one on my terrova and it was flawless for the time I had the boat.
